tools.name: format
tools.description:
Formats the code according to the specified style guide.

This command runs 'make fmt' to format all code in the project according to the configured style guide.

package.title: Package Path
package.description: Specific package or file to format (e.g., dir1 | dir2/... | file.go). Leave empty to format all packages.

tools.name: lint
tools.description: Runs the linter on the code

package.title: Package Path
package.description: Specific package or file to lint (e.g., dir1 | dir2/... | file.go). Leave empty to lint all packages.

tools.name: run_tests
tools.description:
Run the test suite for the project.

Args:
    package: Optional package path to test (default: all packages)

Returns:
    Test results and coverage information

package.title: Package Path
package.description: Specific package to test (e.g., ./cmd/server). Leave empty to test all packages.

test.title: Test Name
test.description: Specific test to run (e.g., TestAddition). Leave empty to run all tests.

tools.name: make_object
tools.description: Code generates a new model / controller / and migration

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: Name of the model to create in snake case.

model_plural.title: Model Plural
model_plural.description: Name of the model in plural form using snake case.
